Name: SPACE DVRTS
About the game: SPACE DVRTS is the definitive dart combat experience set in space for the HTC Vive In SPACE DVRTS you play as an explorer on a hostile alien planet. Whilst the main team is out on an exciting adventure, facing horrible creatures and discovering incredible new technologies, you have been tasked with guarding the ships. So you decide to play a little darts to pass the time. Defend yourself from native aliens and hostile drones! Use high powered darts for alien destruction! Enjoy a lovely game of darts! Current Features A hostile alien planet level A calming practice level onboard the ship Multiple enemy types Local Leaderboards (Endless Mode)
